tha-ap18:9.2: vissakammena māpito → vissakammena nimmito (bj); visukammena māpito (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap18:10.1: Dasasaddāvivittaṃ taṃ → dasa saddā avivittaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap18:14.1: Sacevaseyya agāraṃ → sace vaseyyāgāraṃ (bj); sace vaseyya āgāraṃ (pts-vp-pli1); sacā'vaseyya (?)
tha-ap18:16.4: evaṃ rakkhiṃ mahāmuni → evaṃ rakkhiṃ mahāmune (bj); mamaṃ dakkhi mahāmuni (sya1ed, sya2ed); mamaṃ rakkhi mahāmuni (pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed) 19Th1.A:7 (22 piṭṭhe)
